name: IGeometryBakingContext
description: The context in which a geometry is being baked, providing information such as lighting and transforms , and allowing the user to create materials and query render types .

methods.name: getModelName
methods.description: Returns the name of the model being baked for logging and caching purposes..

methods.name: hasMaterial
methods.description: Checks if a material is present in the model.

methods.name: getMaterial
methods.description: Resolves the final texture name, taking into account texture aliases and replacements.

methods.name: isGui3d
methods.description: Returns true if this model should render in 3D in a GUI, false otherwise.

methods.name: useBlockLight
methods.description: Returns true if block lighting should be used for this model, false otherwise.

methods.name: useAmbientOcclusion
methods.description: Returns true if per-vertex ambient occlusion should be used for this model, false otherwise.

methods.name: getTransforms
methods.description: Returns the transforms for display in item form..

methods.name: getRootTransform
methods.description: Returns the root transformation to be applied to all variants of this model, regardless of item transforms..

methods.name: getRenderTypeHint
methods.description: Returns a hint of the render type this model should use. Custom loaders may ignore this..

methods.name: isComponentVisible
methods.description: Queries the visibility of a component of this model.

methods.name: getRenderType
methods.description: Returns a RenderTypeGroup with the given name, or the empty group if not found..
